nodes.bodyText: The proposed property PROP_TARGET_FOLDR_HINT can hold any value, not just File. To prevent ClassCastException change this and next line to if (value instanceof File) { ... }.

This would be an API change and as such it would need additional attributes of an API change. See the wiki page for overall description. Here is the enumeration of what I am missing the most:

incrementing module version, using @since tag
modifying apichanges.xml
testing the change
